About Nkore Drum

Amplifying the Voice of Western Uganda

Rhythms of Growth

Our Story

Nkore Drum is a storytelling platform dedicated to uncovering and celebrating the unique identity of Western Uganda. We focus on amplifying untold stories that highlight the region's rich cultural heritage, innovation, challenges, and opportunities. Inspired by the traditional drum—a symbol of communication and unity—Nkore Drum strives to connect communities and spark dialogue.

Our slogan "Rhythms of Growth" embodies our commitment to documenting the steady, rhythmic progress of Western Uganda's development across all sectors. Just as the traditional drum beats in harmony with community life, we aim to capture the pulse of growth and transformation in our region.

Vision & Mission

Our Vision

To be the foremost platform for sharing and preserving Western Uganda's authentic narratives, fostering pride, unity, and sustainable development for current and future generations.

Our Mission

  • Amplify the voices of underrepresented communities and individuals in Western Uganda
  • Build a repository of stories that preserve our culture, heritage, and innovation
  • Engage stakeholders in meaningful conversations and collaborations for the region's advancement
  • Document the "Rhythms of Growth" across all aspects of Western Uganda's development

Areas of Focus

Culture & Heritage

  • Traditional customs, beliefs, and art forms
  • Oral histories, festivals, and iconic landmarks

Sports & Analytics

  • Coverage of sports events, teams, and local athletes
  • Development of a sports database for performance tracking and analysis

Business & Innovation

  • Spotlighting entrepreneurs, businesses, and innovations
  • Highlighting industries such as agriculture, tourism, and tech

Arts & Entertainment

  • Promoting artists, musicians, and filmmakers from the region
  • Providing a platform for creative expression and discovery

Socioeconomic Development

  • Addressing issues such as education, healthcare, and infrastructure
  • Sharing success stories and innovative solutions

Scope of Coverage

Ankole Sub-region

  • Mbarara
  • Bushenyi
  • Ntungamo
  • Isingiro
  • Ibanda
  • Kiruhura
  • Sheema
  • Rubirizi
  • Buhweju
  • Mitooma

Kigezi Sub-region

  • Kabale
  • Kisoro
  • Rukungiri
  • Kanungu
  • Rubanda
  • Rukiga

Bunyoro Sub-region

  • Hoima
  • Masindi
  • Buliisa
  • Kiryandongo
  • Kakumiro
  • Kibaale
  • Kagadi

Toro Sub-region

  • Fort Portal (Kabarole)
  • Kasese
  • Kyenjojo
  • Kamwenge
  • Bundibugyo
  • Ntoroko
